title: Quantifying observation error correlations in remotely sensed data

references.title: Accounting for Correlated Observation Error in the ECMWF Analysis.
Diagnosis of observation, background and analysis-error statistics in observation space.
Use of discrete Fourier transforms in the 1D-Var retrieval problem.
